Specimen Type: Skin biopsy tissue sections (fresh-frozen or formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded)
Purpose: To detect and visualize tissue-bound immunoreactants (IgG, IgA, IgM, C3, fibrinogen) in skin samples for diagnostic evaluation of immunologic skin diseases.
Container: Embedded in OCT compound for fresh-frozen sections or in a formalin-fixed paraffin block for FFPE sections
Equipment: Fluorescence microscope, cryostat or microtome, humidified incubation chamber
